event.title: sat near a teenage girl with bacterial meningitis on AirTran flights 687 and 862 on Saturday

data.event: Authorities are currently working with employees of AirTran Airways to find passengers who sat near a teenage girl with bacterial meningitis on AirTran flights 687 and 862 on Saturday.

event.title: notified the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention on Sunday

data.event: Although meningitis cannot be transferred merely through casual contact, AirTran notified the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention on Sunday, and are attempting to track the passengers who sat near the girl on the two flights.
